summary: Slow Horses is a thrilling spy series on Apple TV+ based on Mick Herron's novels. The show follows the adventures of a group of misfit British spies. With new series releasing annually since 2022, it has quickly become a popular and successful show. The third series, 'Real Tigers', premiered in November 2023, and the fourth, 'Spook Street', will air in September 2024. With a fifth series already announced, Slow Horses is a must-watch for thrill-seekers and spy enthusiasts alike.
title: Slow Horses
